text:
@kaitlancollins Probably because @realDonaldTrump (my #birthdayBRO🎈) meets so many people in his line of work that #ITisBEST for him to consume so much #hydroxychloroquine. #2bHONEST, I would heed his warnings & advisements. ¡After all #DJohnT is #theBESTEST @POTUS since #JohnFKennedy!
#COVID19
